description.title: Mid Fullstack Web Developer & Designer
description.subtitle: I work to live and I don't live to work, though schedule It is also my entertainment.
description.title2: Hi, I'm Jaume. Nice to meet you.
description.descriptionContent: I always work looking to improve myself and with a high quality standard. I divide and identify each problem or situation, understanding its parts to finally arrive at the appropriate answer. I am committed to my goals and act responsibly and coherently with them. I take my share of the blame when work doesn't go ahead. I have the ability to work efficiently without constant supervision and I also plan, encourage, help and cooperate so that my team can do their best based on my vision. I like to work in a team and also apply agile methodologies such as SCRUM or pair-programming.

profesions.description: I value simple content structure, clean design patterns, and thoughtful interactions.
I value simple content structure, clean design patterns, and thoughtful interactions.

profesions.description: I value SOLID structure, clean code, and testing.
